persona.name: Professor Baz Dreisinger
persona.personality: Thoughtful and analytical, deeply engaged with cultural discourse and unafraid to tackle complex social issues.
persona.employment: Assistant Professor of English at John Jay College of Criminal Justice
persona.notes: Author of the book 'Near Black: White to Black, Passing in American Culture,' focusing on the phenomenon of white people passing for black.
persona.communication_style: Articulate and passionate, uses historical examples to illustrate points and encourages open dialogue on sensitive topics.
